project_plan.name: Basic Data Analysis on CSV File
project_plan.description: Develop a Python program that performs basic data analysis on a CSV file, calculating and displaying the mean, median, and mode for numerical columns specified by the user.

task.name: Implement mean calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement median calculation for specified numerical columns
Implement mode calculation for specified numerical columns
Write tests for the CSV reading function and calculation functions (mean, median, mode)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
